title: BRIEF-SAExploration Holdings Enters Second Amendment To First Amended And Restated Credit And Security Agreement
text: March 2, 2018 / 9:35 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-SAExploration Holdings Enters Second Amendment To First Amended And Restated Credit And Security Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Saexploration Holdings Inc: * SAEXPLORATION HOLDINGS SAYS ON FEB 28, CO ENTERED INTO A SECOND AMENDMENT TO FIRST AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AND SECURITY AGREEMENT - SEC FILING * SAEXPLORATION HOLDINGS INC - ‍AMENDMENT NO. 2, REMOVES CONDITION PROVIDING FOR A EARLY MATURITY OF SEPTEMBER 14, 2018​ * SAEXPLORATION HOLDINGS INC - ‍MATURITY DATE OF FIRST AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AND SECURITY AGREEMENT IS JANUARY 2, 2020​ * SAEXPLORATION HOLDINGS - ON FEBRUARY 28, 2018, CO, UNITS ALSO ENTERED INTO THIRD AMENDMENT TO TERM LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT, DATED JUNE 29, 2016 * SAEXPLORATION HOLDINGS INC - AMENDMENT NO. 3, AMONG OTHER THINGS, REMOVES CONDITION PROVIDING FOR A EARLY MATURITY OF JANUARY 2, 2019 Source text: ( bit.ly/2HV1MO1 ) Further company coverage:
